Class AdvantageMatch

java.lang.Object
  tennis_two.AbstractContest
      tennis_two.SerialContest
          tennis_two.AdvantageMatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
tennis_two.Contest, tennis_two.Match
public class AdvantageMatch
extends tennis_two.SerialContest
implements tennis_two.Match

An advantage match is made up of advantage sets. Typically a match will be best of 3 or best of 5 sets, as determined by the maxSetCount argument of the factory method. The first server in the match serves in the first game of the first set. The serve then alternates between the players in successive games.
